new-in-ai.title: What’s New in AI and ML
new-in-ai.description: A light-hearted series of demos and experiments showcasing the best and state-of-the-art of modern methods in machine learning and artificial intelligence.

analyzing-movie-reviews.title: Analyzing Sentiment of Movie Reviews
analyzing-movie-reviews.description: An exploration of sentiment analysis and natural language processing

emotion-recognition.title: Emotion Recognition in Comics
emotion-recognition.description: EmoReCom is built for a competition to develop a vision-text method to recognize emotions in comic scenes. This project guides you how to turn ideas into your first submission in an AI competition.

nlp-tutorial-1.title: Intro to Natural Language Processing Part 1: Defining Your Words with Word Embeddings
nlp-tutorial-1.description: Take a sneak peek at the field of NLP and how computers understand human’s language through the use of word embeddings. Also, try your hand at building your first dictionary for computers!

genetic-algorithms.title: Genetic Algorithm Presentation + Visualization
genetic-algorithms.description: A presentation about genetic algorithms with an accompanying online visualization.

attack-image-datasets.title: Exploring Adversarial Attacks on Image Datasets
attack-image-datasets.description: AI is increasingly adopted in multiple fields. Yet, it still remains vulnerable to malicious applications. Learn about adversarial attacks and watch as we demonstrate an attack on an image classification model and cause it to make faulty predictions.

license-plate-recognition.title: License Plate Recognition
license-plate-recognition.description: This workshop showcases how to use OpenCV and EasyOCR to detect license plates from images.

ama-nagar.title: Ask Me Anything with Dr. Nagar
ama-nagar.description: The event would be an Ask Me Anything (AMA) event, similar to a Q&A panel but w/ one person in the spotlight, where the speaker and participants will be able to have a discussion regarding anything AI related.

ai-movie-night.title: End of Summer AI Movie Night
ai-movie-night.description: Bring your snacks and drinks and join us for a movie night social where we’ll be watching and discussing a movie that surrounds Artificial Intelligence! To determine which movie will be selected, take your vote in the #announcements channel on the AIS Discord before Thursday at midnight!
